sub_title: Operations | Corporate Strategy | CX | People and Change
summary: Experienced strategic program manager and operations professional with a strong background in managing complex operations in fast-paced, high-pressure, and multi-cultural environments. With over 17 years of operational experience, including 14 years of people management experience, I have successfully delivered strategic transformation projects for Billing and Customer Administration, Logistics, and Technical Support departments. Combining my solid experience in building and scaling teams and organizations with corporate strategy and customer experience, I deliver a holistic approach to operations.
